column4: hi, when I put a DVD-RW in my cdrom drive, I get an error that says "Cannot mount volume. You are not privileged to mount the volume <cd name>"..  how do I fix this so I can wipe the dvd and burn a new iso to it?
try mounting with sudo
How would I do that?
for example,    sudo mount /dev/sr0
do you use brasero? then sudo brasero should fix ;)
